author: RTÉ News
title: New Zealand PM takes pay cut as virus hits economy
description: New Zealand Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern has announced she will take a 20% pay cut in a symbolic act of solidarity with people struggling financially during the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
New Zealand Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern has announced she will take a 20% pay cut in a symbolic act of solidarity with people struggling financially during the coronavirus pandemic.
Ms Ardern said her personal salary, those of her fellow ministers and of t… [+1429 chars]
